info.title: Spare Cores (SC) Keeper
info.description:
API to search and serve data collected on cloud compute resources.

## Licensing

This is a free service provided by the Spare Cores team, without any warranty.
The source code of the API is licensed under MPL-2.0, find more details at
<https://github.com/SpareCores/sc-keeper>.

## References

- Spare Cores: <https://sparecores.com>
- SC Keeper: <https://github.com/SpareCores/sc-keeper>
- SC Crawler: <https://github.com/SpareCores/sc-crawler>
- SC Data: <https://github.com/SpareCores/sc-data>

get.description: Return database hash and last udpated timestamp.

parameters.name: memory_min

schema.title: Memory amount
schema.description: Minimum amount of memory in MBs.

parameters.description: Minimum amount of memory in MBs.

parameters.name: compliance_framework

schema.title: Compliance Framework id
schema.description: Compliance framework implemented at the vendor.

parameters.description: Compliance framework implemented at the vendor.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of results. Set to -1 for unlimited
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of results. Set to -1 for unlimited

parameters.name: add_total_count_header

schema.description: Add the X-Total-Count header to the response with the overall number of items (without paging). Note that it might reduce response times.
schema.title: Add Total Count Header

parameters.description: Add the X-Total-Count header to the response with the overall number of items (without paging). Note that it might reduce response times.

status.description: Status of the resource (active or inactive).

CpuAllocation.title: CpuAllocation
CpuAllocation.description: CPU allocation methods at cloud vendors.

datacenter_id.title: Datacenter Id
datacenter_id.description: Unique identifier, as called at the Vendor.

aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: List of other commonly used names for the same Datacenter.

country_id.title: Country Id
country_id.description: Reference to the Country, where the Datacenter is located.

state.title: State
state.description: Optional state/administrative area of the Datacenter's location within the Country.

city.title: City
city.description: Optional city name of the Datacenter's location.

address_line.title: Address Line
address_line.description: Optional address line of the Datacenter's location.

zip_code.title: Zip Code
zip_code.description: Optional ZIP code of the Datacenter's location.

founding_year.title: Founding Year
founding_year.description: 4-digit year when the Datacenter was founded.

green_energy.title: Green Energy
green_energy.description: If the Datacenter is 100% powered by renewable energy.

status.description: Status of the resource (active or inactive).

Disk.title: Disk
Disk.description: Disk definition based on size and storage type.

PriceTier.title: PriceTier
PriceTier.description:
Price tier definition.

As standard JSON does not support Inf, NaN etc values,
those should be passed as string, e.g. for the upper bound.

See [float_inf_to_str][sc_crawler.utils.float_inf_to_str] for
converting an infinite numeric value into "Infinity".

PriceUnit.title: PriceUnit
PriceUnit.description: Supported units for the price tables.

server_id.title: Server Id
server_id.description: Unique identifier, as called at the Vendor.

vcpus.title: Vcpus
vcpus.description: Default number of virtual CPUs (vCPU) of the server.

hypervisor.title: Hypervisor
hypervisor.description: Hypervisor of the virtual server, e.g. Xen, KVM, Nitro or Dedicated.

cpu_allocation.description: Allocation of CPU(s) to the server, e.g. shared, burstable or dedicated.

cpu_cores.title: Cpu Cores
cpu_cores.description: Default number of CPU cores of the server. Equals to vCPUs when HyperThreading is disabled.

cpu_architecture.description: CPU architecture (arm64, arm64_mac, i386, or x86_64).

cpu_manufacturer.title: Cpu Manufacturer
cpu_manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the primary processor, e.g. Intel or AMD.

cpu_family.title: Cpu Family
cpu_family.description: The product line/family of the primary processor, e.g. Xeon, Core i7, Ryzen 9.

cpu_model.title: Cpu Model
cpu_model.description: The model number of the primary processor, e.g. 9750H.

cpus.title: Cpus
cpus.description: JSON array of known CPU details, e.g. the manufacturer, family, model; L1/L2/L3 cache size; microcode version; feature flags; bugs etc.

gpu_memory_min.title: Gpu Memory Min
gpu_memory_min.description: Memory (MiB) allocated to the lowest-end GPU accelerator.

gpu_memory_total.title: Gpu Memory Total
gpu_memory_total.description: Overall memory (MiB) allocated to all the GPU accelerator(s).

gpu_manufacturer.title: Gpu Manufacturer
gpu_manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the primary GPU accelerator, e.g. Nvidia or AMD.

gpu_model.title: Gpu Model
gpu_model.description: The model number of the primary GPU accelerator.

gpus.title: Gpus
gpus.description: JSON array of GPU accelerator details, including the manufacturer, name, and memory (MiB) of each GPU.

storage_type.description: Primary disk type, e.g. HDD, SSD, NVMe SSD, or network).

storages.title: Storages
storages.description: JSON array of disks attached to the server, including the size (MiB) and type of each disk.

network_speed.title: Network Speed
network_speed.description: The baseline network performance (Gbps) of the network card.

inbound_traffic.title: Inbound Traffic
inbound_traffic.description: Amount of complimentary inbound traffic (GB) per month.

outbound_traffic.title: Outbound Traffic
outbound_traffic.description: Amount of complimentary outbound traffic (GB) per month.

status.description: Status of the resource (active or inactive).

allocation.description: Allocation method, e.g. on-demand or spot.

unit.description: Billing unit of the pricing model.

price.title: Price
price.description: Actual price of a billing unit.

price_upfront.title: Price Upfront
price_upfront.description: Price to be paid when setting up the resource.

price_tiered.title: Price Tiered
price_tiered.description: List of pricing tiers with min/max thresholds and actual prices.

status.description: Status of the resource (active or inactive).

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Last known status of a resource, e.g. active or inactive.

StorageType.title: StorageType
StorageType.description: Type of a storage, e.g. HDD or SSD.

logo.title: Logo
logo.description: Publicly accessible URL to the image of the Vendor's logo.

country_id.title: Country Id
country_id.description: Reference to the Country, where the Vendor's main headquarter is located.

state.title: State
state.description: Optional state/administrative area of the Vendor's location within the Country.

city.title: City
city.description: Optional city name of the Vendor's main location.

address_line.title: Address Line
address_line.description: Optional address line of the Vendor's main location.

zip_code.title: Zip Code
zip_code.description: Optional ZIP code of the Vendor's main location.

founding_year.title: Founding Year
founding_year.description: 4-digit year when the Vendor was founded.

status_page.title: Status Page
status_page.description: Public status page of the Vendor.

zone_id.title: Zone Id
zone_id.description: Unique identifier, as called at the Vendor.
